sql:
SELECT
	mentain_workshop.reqID,
	mentain_workshop.Station,
	mentain_workshop.vehNo,
	mentain_workshop.servicetype,
	mentain_workshop.description,
	mentain_workshop.KMR,
	mentain_workshop.requestedby,
	mentain_workshop.requestedon,
	mentain_workshop.arrivaltime,
	mentain_workshop.arrivaldate,
	mentain_workshop.vehType,
	mentain_workshop.chasisNo,
	mentain_workshop.repairInstruction,
	mentain_workshop.KMRin,
	mentain_workshop.KMRout,
	mentain_workshop.WOreqBy,
	mentain_workshop.WOreqOn,
	mentain_workshop.status,
	mentain_workshop.workorder_id,
	mentain_workshop.workDate,
	mentain_workshop.partsUsed,
	mentain_workshop.reccomendation,
	mentain_workshop.submittedby,
	mentain_workshop.submittedOn,
	CASE
  WHEN submittedOn IS NULL OR submittedOn = '' THEN 
    DATEDIFF(DATE(WOreqOn), CURDATE())
  ELSE 
    DATEDIFF(DATE(submittedOn),DATE(WOreqOn))
END AS total_days_at_wkshop,
	stations.REGION_ID,
	regions.REGION
FROM
	mentain_workshop
	INNER JOIN stations ON stations.STATION = mentain_workshop.Station
	INNER JOIN regions ON regions.REGION_ID = stations.REGION_ID
ORDER BY
	mentain_workshop.reqID DESC
name: mentain_workshop

placeholder.English: What work was done on the Vehicle? Include all work done that might not have been part of the workorder.

fields.name: total_days_at_wkshop
fields.sqlExpression:
CASE
  WHEN submittedOn IS NULL OR submittedOn = '' THEN 
    DATEDIFF(DATE(WOreqOn), CURDATE())
  ELSE 
    DATEDIFF(DATE(submittedOn),DATE(WOreqOn))
END

title.text: CREW THAT WORKED ON THE VEHICLE
